summary: This code seems to be importing a module called "chain" for chaining functions, despite the author expressing doubt about its necessity due to list processing power.

details.comment: This code seems to be importing a module called "chain" for chaining functions, despite the author expressing doubt about its necessity due to list processing power.
details.content:
# how to chain functions?
# it is hard. we have list processing power. why fucking bother?
import chain
